thread.title: Scandinavian Home Staging
thread.title_full: Houzz reviewed by Scandinavian Home Staging

author: Scandinavian Home Staging
title: Scandinavian Home Staging
text:
Houzz is a fantastic place to shop, find pros and be inspired.
I love that I fx can create idea books, to inspire my clients with my Scandinavian inspired style, when I do design services and home stagings. Thanks Houzz for creating a site that works fantastic for both private and professionals.
